ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: We took the night with the highest member being about 28 and most around 25-27. This was a few months back, was he beefed up? IIRC we had Cleric level 28,
ygData.messageBody:
We took the night with the highest member being about
28 and most around 25-27. This was a few months back,
was he beefed up?

IIRC we had Cleric level 28, Cleric Level 26, Wizard
Level 27 and me at Level 19 Ranger (damned scary!).

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Mid to High 30s group...heh. He's a biatch I hear.
> Don't even think of
> kiting him you shamans...He runs as fast as SoC I'm
> told...and has a nice HT
> to boot...
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Doug Sorensen
> [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 3:42 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>
>
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> Yes, both are from the Knight. I have heard that
> the
> tunic is about 1 out of 10 kills.
>
> The level ranges sound about right, if you have a
> cleric or two you can get by with a little lower. If
> I
> recall, he does use harm touch for about 300 hits,
> so
> be prepared for that.
>
> My guess is that the Polished bone hoops are from
> Chief Goonda the Ogre Shaman in W. Karana. Mid 30s
> group? Maybe someone else can comment on this..
>
> Belgarth
>
> --- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> > From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> >
> > Bloodstained Mantle and Bloostained Tunic, both
> off
> > the Undead Knight in
> > Unrest? If so, what level party you need (I have
> > heard prolly around 26-30?)
> > to take him down? And how rare are the drops off
> > him?
> >
> > Also, Polished Bone Hoops, same info needed.
> Level,
> > zone, mob...etc...
> >
> > Thanks!
>
